DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether vitamin D supplementation improve physical performance person severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Supplemental Vitamin D Skeletal Muscle Function Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Patients
DOC.criteria: COPD Forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) < = 50 % predict Smoking history least 10 packyears Able ambulate independently use ambulatory assist device ( cane walker ) Currently take > 500 I.U . per day vitamin D supplement Primary diagnosis asthma Uncompensated heart failure Heart attack previous 6 month Kidney disease ( glomerular filtration rate < 45 mL/min/1.73m2 )
